description: The change to using a generic RPC casting handler breaks diagnostics API functionality.
title: Diagnostics broken in trunk

comments.content: The change to using a generic RPC casting handler breaks diagnostics API functionality.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jk0

comments.content: I'm wondering why our unittests did not pick this up when the change was made to the cast mechanism?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jaypipes
